bill.title: Mississippi Cosmetology Practice Act; make technical amendments and delete repealer.
bill.description: An Act To Reenact Sections 73-7-1 Through 73-7-37 And 73-7-51 Through 73-7-61, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Prescribe The Powers And Duties Of The Mississippi Board Of Cosmetology; To Make Certain Technical Amendments To The Cosmetology Licensure Law; To Amend Section 73-7-2, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise The Definition Of Cosmetology And Esthetics For Purposes Of Licensure Requirements; To Amend Section 73-7-7, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Clarify The Membership Of The Mississippi Cosmetology Council; To Amend Sections 73-7-9, 73-7-12, 73-7-19, 73-7-35 And 73-7-71, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Delete Authority For Wig Specialists; To Amend Section 73-7-12, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Clarify Qualifications For Cosmetology Examinations; To Amend Section 73-7-14, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize Master Manicurist And Esthetician Licensure; To Amend Section 73-7-15, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Clarify Qualifications For A Cosmetology Instructor's License; To Amend Section 73-7-16, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide For Biennial License Fees And To Clarify Certain Testing Requirements For Students At Schools Of Cosmetology; To Amend Section 73-7-17, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide For Renewal Of A Salon License; To Amend Section 73-7-21, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize Electric Nail File Regulations; To Amend Section 73-7-23, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide For License Reciprocity With Other States; To Amend Sections 73-7-27 And 73-7-37, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide For Appeal Of Licensure Disciplinary Action And To Increase Authorized Fines; To Amend Section 73-7-29, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide For Fees; To Repeal Sections 73-7-51 Through 73-7-61, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provide For Wig Specialist And Wig Salon Licensure; To Repeal Section 73-7-63, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provides An Automatic Repealer On The Cosmetology Practice Act; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Welfare
Title Suff Do Pass Comm Sub
